definition: to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]
pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)

sentences.english: When the utility model is used, shaped sterilized sanitary pad paper is glued on the seat pad of a sitting closet.
sentences.chinese: 使用时将成型的消毒卫生垫纸贴在马桶的坐垫上面。

sentences.english: It is the same kind of grass that one of the children gave Siddhartha to use as a cushion to sit on.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个孩子拿来给悉达多当坐垫的草。

sentences.english: Produced the cushion of gules back of a chair and blue so.
sentences.chinese: 这样就产生了红色的靠背和蓝色的坐垫。

sentences.english: Small pads along the bottom keep from scratching your toilet seat.
sentences.chinese: 坐垫的底部还带有小垫片，以免划伤你的坐厕。

sentences.english: Do not buy a car seat if it is missing the label which lists its manufacturing date.
sentences.chinese: 不要购买一个没有生产日期标签的汽车坐垫。

sentences.english: Businesses might want to place softer cushions on chairs in their negotiation rooms.
sentences.chinese: 商家也许想在谈判室放些更松软的坐垫。

sentences.english: The XLR's seats are both heated and cooled in the back and the cushion .
sentences.chinese: 在XLR的座位都是加热和冷却的背部和坐垫。

sentences.english: Do I want leather seats or vinyl?
sentences.chinese: 我要皮革坐垫或是车纹吗？

sentences.english: Comfortable, well-padded seats are good for them.
sentences.chinese: 装有坐垫的舒适车座最适合他们使用。

sentences.english: The chair features five frame sections with interwoven rope and leather cushion pads.
sentences.chinese: 这把椅子五个框架特点由交织绳和皮革坐垫构成。

sentences.english: You can either use a seiza bench for this or sit astride a couple of cushions that you have placed on your mat.
sentences.chinese: 你可以坐在凳上或这几个叠起来的坐垫上。

sentences.english: I calmly unrolled my mat in my favorite spot, back right corner by the window.
sentences.chinese: 我静静的在我最喜欢的右后侧靠窗的角落打开坐垫。

sentences.english: On two rows of red cushions sat the members of the Committee.
sentences.chinese: 在两排红色的坐垫上，端坐着“委员会”的成员们。

sentences.english: There sits the meditator parked on his little cushion.
sentences.chinese: 禅定者坐在自己的坐垫上。

sentences.english: The auto manufacturer discontinued that car back in 1999.
sentences.chinese: 汽车制造商在1999年停止生产那种汽车坐垫。

sentences.english: The product of the present invention may be used in sofa and automobile cushions.
sentences.chinese: 本发明提供的产品可用于沙发和汽车坐垫领域。
